title: FSIS Issues Public Health Alert for Beef Products due to Possible E. coli O157:H7 Contamination
summary: WASHINGTON, October 16, 2019 The U.S. Department of Agriculture's Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) is issuing a public health alert for raw non-intact beef products derived from imported beef from Ontario, Canada that has been recalled by Ryding-Regency Meat Packers, Ltd. because it may...
